usage.cn: 我们必须接受失望，因为它是有限的，但千万不可失去希望，因为它是无穷的。
usage.eng: We must accept finite disappointment, but we must never lose infinite hope.

usage.cn: 一次又一次的失望，让我退到无处可退。 我真的累了，很累很累。 可不可以让我休息一下。
usage.eng: Again and again, let my disappointment withdrew to nowhere to retreat. I'm really tired, tired tired. Can let me have a rest.
